location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Translation of an enclosure of a letter from Ahmed [Abdullah bin Ahmad al Khalifa], Sheikh of Bahrein to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Part of the correspondent's name and the first paragraph of the letter have been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is stating that he cannot prevent ships from Ras al-Khaima [Ra's al-Khaymah] from frequenting his ports owing to a treaty between himself and Abdella ben Saood [Abdullah bin Su'ud], but he will inform him that his ships may be seized by the English.
